title: OpenAI, DeepMind, and Anthropic to give UK early access to AI models for safety research
description: The UK has been ahead of other countries in AI safety and regulations, and this announcement comes with the creation of an AI Taskforce.

title: GPT-4-generated pitches are 3x more likely to secure funding than human ones
description: Want to secure a hefty investment for your business? You may want to use an AI chatbot.

description: Looking for a new job? These stats could help narrow your search.

title: The best LastPass alternatives of 2023
description: Leaving LastPass? Our top password manager picks have strong security, easy-to-use features, and multiplatform support.

title: Over 7,000 subreddits go dark to protest Reddit API changes
description: The blackout, which was planned ahead of time, will last for 48 hours.

title: GPT-3.5 vs GPT-4: Is ChatGPT Plus worth its subscription fee?
description: ChatGPT-3.5 is all well and good, but ChatGPT-4, at $20 a month via ChatGPT Plus, is a good deal smarter and more accurate.

title: Ubuntu Studio is the perfect operating system for creators
description: This Ubuntu Flavor is jam-packed with the tools necessary for those who create audio and visual content.

title: This Lenovo laptop makes a case for using gaming hardware at work
description: The Lenovo Legion Pro 5i has an understated design that's more reminiscent of office laptops than its gaming contemporaries. That makes it worth a look no matter what type of user you are.

title: Apple's rumored cheaper Vision Pro headset is still disconnected from reality
description: According to Bloomberg's Apple analyst, Apple is working on two more mixed-reality headsets to ramp up sales and make the Vision Pro Apple's Next Big Thing.

title: How to chat with ChatGPT right on your Apple Watch. Meet Petey AI
description: Type or dictate your request, and Petey will use its AI smarts to respond.

title: How to install the latest version of the free LibreOffice office suite on Linux
description: With Red Hat announcing it will no longer make LibreOffice available as an RPM in the official repositories, here's the best way to get the latest version.

title: These wireless earbuds have a killer feature that lets you ditch your phone
description: The JBL Tour Pro 2 may just be the start of something new with wireless earbuds.

title: 5 ways to explore the use of generative AI at work
description: ChatGPT and other generative AI tools have captured the public imagination. Here's how you can turn a much hyped tool into a productivity boon.

title: I bought 4 brand-name tech gadgets on Temu for work. Here's how it went
description: Temu, the wildly popular shopping app, has an array of electronics to try. I put some of them to the test for a week and was genuinely surprised by what I found.

title: I'm paying Elon Musk's blue checkmark ransom. Let's see what happens

title: 5 ways ChatGPT can make parenting easier this summer

title: Bing Image Creator vs DALL-E 2: Which generates the best AI images?
description: As generative AI becomes more and more popular, users have a range of tools they can use to create images. We'll help you choose the best one for you.
